Name: Demolisher

Actions.Name: Pound
Actions.Effects: Deals bonus damage for each: character is winded, dazed, or stunned.

Combo.Name: Battle Shout
Combo.Description: Characters in range 3 take [fray] damage and are shoved 1 towards the Demolisher.

Combo.Name: Massive Impact
Combo.Effects: Attack target must save or be stunned.

Actions.Name: Hurl Boulder
Actions.Effects: A foe in range 3 takes 2 damage and is shoved 1, then create a height 1 boulder object next to them.

Actions.Name: Lash
Actions.Description: The Demolisher whips a chain, hook, or weapon around a foe in range 5, shoving them 3 spaces towards the Demolisher.

PhasesDescription: Starts in Phase I and enters Phase II when bloodied.

Actions.Name: Charge
Actions.Description: Dash 4 in a straight line. All characters the Demolisher passes over are shoved 1 to the side and take [fray] damage.

Actions.Name: Charge
Actions.Description: Dash 4 in a straight line. All characters the Demolisher passes over are shoved 1 to the side and take [fray] damage.

Actions.Name: Great Lash
Actions.Description: The Demolisher whips a chain or hook around all foes in range 5. They are shoved 3 spaces towards the Demolisher.
